import { Playground, Props } from 'docz'
import { Button } from './Button.tsx'
Buttons allow the user interact with just one click.

<Playground>
  <Button theme="info">Some message</Button>
  <Button theme="success">Some message</Button>
  <Button theme="danger">Some message</Button>
  <Button theme="warning">Some message</Button>
  <Button theme="disabled">Some message</Button>
</Playground>

<Playground>
  <Button theme="primary-outline">Some message</Button>
  <Button theme="info-outline">Some message</Button>
  <Button theme="success-outline">Some message</Button>
</Playground>
